reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-made, with thick fabric that isn't see-through.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: I wore this dress to a formal wedding and let me tell you, I was in love with it! I received so many compliments. I ordered it on a whim the day before the wedding (I didnâ€™t really love what I had already chosen to wear), and received it early morning of the day of the wedding. I really had no expectations that it would work out given the last minute decision to order it. But it fit and looked great! (I did add a little detail myself - a black bow to the side of the dress that has the slit, so donâ€™t be deceived into thinking that comes on the dress). The dress is the perfect length for me, fits amazingly, is so comfortable to move around and dance in, and the material is very durable. It has stretch and is a comfortable thickness without being heavy. The next time I have to go to a formal event or gala, Iâ€™m ordering it again in a different color- thatâ€™s how much I love it! Not to mention, itâ€™s only $50â€¦câ€™mon! Canâ€™t beat that value! (For reference, Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€ and about 130 lbs and I ordered a size small). Read more
items.author: Kristi Hannig

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a lovely dress!
items.body: Beautiful! Bought it for a Bride of Frankenstein costume and itâ€™s exactly what I wanted! It fits perfectly and is nice and stretchy if I indulge too much in festivities. Its material is like the athletic dresses I love to wear. I bought it in white and it has a slight sheen so would be ideal for a beach wedding gown if we renew our vows. It doesnâ€™t necessarily have a train but touches the floor. Iâ€™m 5â€™6 and fluctuate between 155lbs and 160lbs. Read more
items.author: Rana Davis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress
items.body: This dress is super sexy! It stayed in place while I danced the night away at a friendâ€™s wedding. The material is thick, so not at all see through. Itâ€™s got quite a slit, so be aware if you donâ€™t want to show that much leg. You could probably add a couple stitches if needed. Great fit, I got a lot of compliments on it. I was having so much fun, I forgot to get some pics in it. Read more
items.author: Erika J

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color not as expected, still beautiful
items.body: The dress is nice. It offers a comfortable and flattering fit that shapes my body nicely. The material isnâ€™t thin or see through which felt nice. There werenâ€™t any loose threads or unraveling ones which many others at this price point have had. However, the color is a much brighter purple than the dark one on the image. This is always a risk with online shopping but still unfortunately. The color, though not what I was expecting was still nice and beautiful so I decided to keep it. Wouldâ€™ve been five stars if the color was darker like the product image. Read more
items.author: K.Hilll

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful dress. so comfy. so easy to wear!
items.body: this dress is my new obsession. i think i want it in every color. i am so shockingly impressed with how well it fit and stayed in place! I washed it (as i do with all new things) in my regular washer but by itself. and then i hung it to dry and it was ready to go! this is the material i am always looking for in a dress and i never know how to describe it, but now i know i just have to buy this dress and all the other ones this company makes. absolutely top tier in every way! oooh, just a quick fyi, that slit is realllll high, so just be aware of that! (also, don't look at my dirty mirror!) Read more
items.author: DanielleM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress -150% would recommend!!!
items.body: This dress was beautiful and fit my teenage daughter for prom, just perfectly! I bought her a size Medium(she is 120lbs and 5' 3" tall w/1.5" heels on in the picture). It was modest, stretchy material, perfect for dancing in, and the fold over parts of the "off the shoulder"&neck/back area lay beautifully without any constant adjustment needed. The color was dark navy blue and was absolutely gorgeous -it fit her like a glove which we was hesitant and leery about the fit of this dress before ordering. It was awesome material and not uncomfortable or scratchy against her skin. The dress was not sheer, so she was able to wear any undergarments with this dress. Overall, I would highly recommend and would def buy this dress again 150%!!(Just another color to add to her wardrobe ðŸ˜ Read more
items.author: Fairybrooklynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Beautiful dress, great material, nice and thick. Not see through at all Read more
items.author: Sandra Perez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant & Flattering â€“ A Stunning Gift with Minor Sizing Nuance
items.body: I purchased this dress for my girlfriend for a formal event, and it was a resounding success. She felt absolutely radiant in it, and the compliments she received throughout the evening were a testament to its impact. What We Loved: Elegant Design: The off-shoulder neckline and high split added a touch of sophistication and allure, making her feel confident and glamorous. Flattering Fit: The ruched detailing along the sides beautifully accentuated her curves, providing a slimming effect that she adored. Comfortable Wear: Despite its form-fitting nature, the fabric was stretchy and comfortable, allowing her to move and dance with ease. Versatile Style: Perfect for a variety of formal occasions, from weddings to galas, this dress proved to be a versatile addition to her wardrobe. Minor Consideration: Sizing Nuance: While the dress fit well overall, the sizing can be a bit tricky. She found that the medium size was slightly roomy in certain areas, leading to occasional adjustments for a perfect fit. It's advisable to consult the size chart carefully and consider sizing down if between sizes. Final Thoughts: This dress made for a memorable gift, enhancing her natural beauty and boosting her confidence. It's a stunning choice for anyone seeking a blend of elegance and modern flair. Just be mindful of the sizing to ensure the best fit. Read more
items.author: Jackson Thao

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress High Split Formal Evening Sleeveless Ruched Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress High Split Formal Evening Sleeveless Ruched Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress High Split Formal Evening Sleeveless Ruched Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, Navy, Pink, White, Darkpurple, Peacock Blue, Royalblue, Rose, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
